Layout/IndentationConsistency.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: normal (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['normal', 'indented_internal_methods'] (type: list)
References: ['https://edgeguides.rubyonrails.org/contributing_to_ruby_on_rails.html#follow-the-coding-conventions'] (type: list)
